headline: Here Is Why Analysts Are Slashing Adobe Inc. (ADBE)’s Price Targets
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is among the 10 Best Money Making Stocks to Invest In. The stock has seen a series of price target reductions over the past month from several analysts. On September 11, Citigroup lowered ADBE’s share price target to $400 from $450, citing risks around the company’s pricing strategy in the medium term. However, […]

headline: Comparably Announces 2025 Happiest Employees, Best Perks & Benefits, and Work-Life Balance Awards
summary: VANCOUVER, Wash., September 30, 2025--Comparably (a ZoomInfo company) – a leading employee review platform for workplace culture and compensation – today announced the winners of its 2025 Happiest Employees, Best Perks & Benefits, and Best Work-Life Balance awards. Google made a dramatic leap from 7th place to #1 in Best Perks & Benefits, reflecting renewed focus on comprehensive employee retention strategies.

content.title: Comparably Announces 2025 Happiest Employees, Best Perks & Benefits, and Work-Life Balance Awards

Google made a dramatic leap from 7th place to #1 in Best Perks & Benefits, reflecting renewed focus on comprehensive employee retention strategies.

headline: Adobe Premiere Now Delivers Fast, Pro-Quality Video Editing on Mobile
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., September 30, 2025--Today, Adobe (Nasdaq:ADBE) announced that the company is bringing its industry leading Adobe Premiere video editor to mobile in a powerful new iPhone app that empowers creators to make pro-quality video on the go. The Adobe Premiere mobile app makes it fast, free and intuitive for creators to edit their videos with precision editing on a lightning-fast multi-track timeline, produce studio-quality audio with crystal clear voiceovers and perfectly timed AI sou

content.title: Adobe Premiere Now Delivers Fast, Pro-Quality Video Editing on Mobile
content.summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., September 30, 2025--Today, Adobe (Nasdaq:ADBE) announced that the company is bringing its industry leading Adobe Premiere video editor to mobile in a powerful new iPhone app that empowers creators to make pro-quality video on the go. The Adobe Premiere mobile app makes it fast, free and intuitive for creators to edit their videos with precision editing on a lightning-fast multi-track timeline, produce studio-quality audio with crystal clear voiceovers and perfectly timed AI sou

thumbnail.caption: Adobe Premiere, the trusted video editor of YouTubers, filmmakers, music video editors and more, is available today for free on iPhone, delivering fast, intuitive and powerful editing for creators on the go.
